get.description: Query Test Runs based on filters. Mandatory fields are minLastUpdatedDate and maxLastUpdatedDate.

parameters.name: collection
parameters.description: The name of the Azure DevOps collection.

parameters.name: project
parameters.description: Project ID or project name

parameters.name: minLastUpdatedDate
parameters.description: Minimum Last Modified Date of run to be queried (Mandatory).

parameters.name: maxLastUpdatedDate
parameters.description: Maximum Last Modified Date of run to be queried (Mandatory, difference between min and max date can be atmost 7 days).

parameters.name: state
parameters.description: Current state of the Runs to be queried.

values.description: Only used during an update to preserve the existing value.
The run is still being created.  No tests have started yet.
Tests are running.
All tests have completed or been skipped.
Run is stopped and remaining tests have been aborted
Run is currently initializing This is a legacy state and should not be used any more
Run requires investigation because of a test point failure This is a legacy state and should not be used any more

parameters.name: planIds
parameters.description: Plan Ids of the Runs to be queried, comma separated list of valid ids.

parameters.name: isAutomated
parameters.description: Automation type of the Runs to be queried.

parameters.name: publishContext
parameters.description: PublishContext of the Runs to be queried.

values.description: Run is published for Build Context.
Run is published for Release Context.
Run is published for any Context.

parameters.name: buildIds
parameters.description: Build Ids of the Runs to be queried, comma separated list of valid ids.

parameters.name: buildDefIds
parameters.description: Build Definition Ids of the Runs to be queried, comma separated list of valid ids.

parameters.name: branchName
parameters.description: Source Branch name of the Runs to be queried.

parameters.name: releaseIds
parameters.description: Release Ids of the Runs to be queried, comma separated list of valid ids.

parameters.name: releaseDefIds
parameters.description: Release Definition Ids of the Runs to be queried, comma separated list of valid ids.

parameters.name: releaseEnvIds
parameters.description: Release Environment Ids of the Runs to be queried, comma separated list of valid ids.

parameters.name: releaseEnvDefIds
parameters.description: Release Environment Definition Ids of the Runs to be queried, comma separated list of valid ids.

parameters.name: runTitle
parameters.description: Run Title of the Runs to be queried.

parameters.name: $top
parameters.description: Number of runs to be queried. Limit is 100

parameters.name: continuationToken
parameters.description: continuationToken received from previous batch or null for first batch. It is not supposed to be created (or altered, if received from last batch) by user.

parameters.description: file name prefix to filter the list of attachments

parameters.name: fetchMetaData

AggregatedResultDetailsByOutcome.description: Result deatils for a particular test result outcome.

count.description: Number of results for current outcome.

values.description: Only used during an update to preserve the existing value.
Test has not been completed, or the test type does not report pass/failure.
Test was executed w/o any issues.
Test was executed, but there were issues. Issues may involve exceptions or failed assertions.
Test has completed, but we can't say if it passed or failed. May be used for aborted tests...
The test timed out
Test was aborted. This was not caused by a user gesture, but rather by a framework decision.
Test had it chance for been executed but was not, as ITestElement.IsRunnable == false.
Test was not executed. This was caused by a user gesture - e.g. user hit stop button.
To be used by Run level results. This is not a failure.
There was a system error while we were trying to execute a test.
Test is Not Applicable for execution.
Test is paused.
Test is currently executing. Added this for TCM charts
Test is not impacted. Added fot TIA.
Only used during an update to preserve the existing value.
Test has not been completed, or the test type does not report pass/failure.
Test was executed w/o any issues.
Test was executed, but there were issues. Issues may involve exceptions or failed assertions.
Test has completed, but we can't say if it passed or failed. May be used for aborted tests...
The test timed out
Test was aborted. This was not caused by a user gesture, but rather by a framework decision.
Test had it chance for been executed but was not, as ITestElement.IsRunnable == false.
Test was not executed. This was caused by a user gesture - e.g. user hit stop button.
To be used by Run level results. This is not a failure.
There was a system error while we were trying to execute a test.
Test is Not Applicable for execution.
Test is paused.
Test is currently executing. Added this for TCM charts
Test is not impacted. Added fot TIA.
Run with zero failed tests and has at least one impacted test
Run with at-least one failed test.
Run with no impacted tests.
Runs with All tests in other category.
Only used during an update to preserve the existing value.
The run is still being created.  No tests have started yet.
Tests are running.
All tests have completed or been skipped.
Run is stopped and remaining tests have been aborted
Run is currently initializing This is a legacy state and should not be used any more
Run requires investigation because of a test point failure This is a legacy state and should not be used any more

branchName.description: Branch name for which build is generated.

sourceVersion.description: Source Version(/first commit) for the build was triggered.

CodeCoverageData.description: Represents the build configuration (platform, flavor) and coverage data for the build

buildFlavor.description: Flavor of build for which data is retrieved/published

buildPlatform.description: Platform of build for which data is retrieved/published

coverageStats.description: List of coverage data for the build

CodeCoverageStatistics.description: Represents the code coverage statistics for a particular coverage label (modules, statements, blocks, etc.)

CodeCoverageSummary.description: Represents the code coverage summary results Used to publish or retrieve code coverage summary against a build

build.description: Uri of build for which data is retrieved/published

coverageData.description: List of coverage data and details for the build

values.description: No coverage status
The summary evaluation is in progress
The summary evaluation is finalized and won't change
The summary evaluation is pending
Summary evaluation may be ongoing but another merge has been requested.
No coverage modules found
Number of Files exceeded
TNo Input Files
Build got cancelled by user
Coverage Jobs failed
Module merge Timeout
Coverage successfully completed
Invalid Build Configuration
Coverage Analyzer Build not found
Failed to requeue the build
Build got Bailed out
No Code coverage configured
CoverageMerge Job failed
CoverageMergeInvoker Job failed
CoverageMonitor Job failed
CoverageMergeInvoker Job timeout
CoverageMonitor Job timeout
Invalid Coverage Input file

deltaBuild.description: Uri of build against which difference in coverage is computed

status.description: Uri of build against which difference in coverage is computed

values.description: No coverage status
The summary evaluation is in progress
The summary evaluation for the previous request is completed. Summary can change in future
The summary evaluation is finalized and won't change
The summary evaluation is pending
Summary evaluation may be ongoing but another merge has been requested.

CustomTestField.description: A custom field information. Allowed Key : Value pairs - ( AttemptId: int value, IsTestResultFlaky: bool)

DtlEnvironmentDetails.description: This is a temporary class to provide the details for the test run environment.

FailingSince.description: Failing since information of a test result.

flakyDetectionType.description: FlakyDetectionType defines Detection type i.e. 1. System or 2. Manual.

values.description: Custom defines manual detection type.
Defines System detection type.

allowedPipelines.description: AllowedPipelines - List All Pipelines allowed for detection.

isAllPipelinesAllowed.description: IsAllPipelinesAllowed if users configure all system's pipelines.

flakyInSummaryReport.description: FlakyInSummaryReport defines flaky data should show in summary report or not.

isFlakyBugCreated.description: IsFlakyBugCreated defines if there is any bug that has been created with flaky testresult.

manualMarkUnmarkFlaky.description: ManualMarkUnmarkFlaky defines manual marking unmarking of flaky testcase.

JobReference.description: Job in pipeline. This is related to matrixing in YAML.

jobName.description: Matrixing in YAML generates copies of a job with different inputs in matrix. JobName is the name of those input. Maximum supported length for name is 256 character.

logNewTests.description: LogNewTests defines whether or not we will record new test cases coming into the system

phaseName.description: Name of the phase. Maximum supported length for name is 256 character.

pipelineId.description: Reference of the pipeline with which this pipeline instance is related.

PipelineTestMetrics.description: Test summary of a pipeline instance.

currentContext.description: Reference of Pipeline instance for which test summary is calculated.

resultsAnalysis.description: This is the return value for metric ResultsAnalysis Results insights which include failure analysis, increase/decrease in results count analysis.

resultSummary.description: This is the return value for metric ResultSummary Results summary based on results outcome.

runSummary.description: This is the return value for metric RunSummary Run summary.

ResultsAnalysis.description: Results insights for runs with state completed and NeedInvestigation.

previousContext.description: Reference of pipeline instance from which to compare the results.

resultsDifference.description: Increase/Decrease in counts of results for a different outcome with respect to PreviousContext.

testFailuresAnalysis.description: Failure analysis of results with respect to PreviousContext

ResultsSummaryByOutcome.description: Result summary by the outcome of test results.

aggregatedResultDetailsByOutcome.description: Aggregated result details for each test result outcome.

notReportedTestCount.description: Total number of not reported test results.

totalTestCount.description: Total number of test results. (It includes NotImpacted test results as well which need to exclude while calculating pass/fail test result percentage).

ResultSummary.description: Summary of results for a pipeline instance.

resultSummaryByRunState.description: Result summary of pipeline, group by TestRun state.

automated.description: true if test run is automated, false otherwise. By default it will be false.

build.description: An abstracted reference to the build that it belongs.

buildDropLocation.description: Drop location of the build used for test run.

buildFlavor.description: Flavor of the build used for test run. (E.g: Release, Debug)

buildPlatform.description: Platform of the build used for test run. (E.g.: x86, amd64)

comment.description: Comments entered by those analyzing the run.

completeDate.description: Completed date time of the run.

configurationIds.description: IDs of the test configurations associated with the run.

controller.description: Name of the test controller used for automated run.

dueDate.description: Due date and time for test run.

errorMessage.description: Error message associated with the run.

filter.description: Filter used for discovering the Run.

iteration.description: The iteration in which to create the run. Root iteration of the team project will be default

owner.description: Display name of the owner of the run.

pipelineReference.description: Reference of the pipeline to which this test run belongs. PipelineReference.PipelineId should be equal to RunCreateModel.Build.Id

plan.description: An abstracted reference to the plan that it belongs.

pointIds.description: IDs of the test points to use in the run.

releaseEnvironmentUri.description: URI of release environment associated with the run.

releaseReference.description: Reference to release associated with test run.

releaseUri.description: URI of release associated with the run.

runSummary.description: Run summary for run Type = NoConfigRun.

runTimeout.description: Timespan till the run times out.

startDate.description: Start date time of the run.

state.description: The state of the run. Type TestRunState Valid states - NotStarted, InProgress, Waiting

tags.description: Tags to attach with the test run, maximum of 5 tags can be added to run.

testEnvironmentId.description: ID of the test environment associated with the run.

testSettings.description: An abstracted reference to the test settings resource.

type.description: Type of the run(RunType) Valid Values : (Unspecified, Normal, Blocking, Web, MtrRunInitiatedFromWeb, RunWithDtlEnv, NoConfigRun)

RunFilter.description: This class is used to provide the filters used for discovery

sourceFilter.description: filter for the test case sources (test containers)

count.description: Test result count fo the given outcome.

values.description: Rerun metadata
Flaky metadata

RunSummary.description: Summary of runs for a pipeline instance.

duration.description: Total time taken by runs with state completed and NeedInvestigation.

runSummaryByOutcome.description: Runs count by outcome for runs with state completed and NeedInvestigation runs.

RunSummaryModel.description: Run summary for each output type of test.

resultCount.description: Number of results for Outcome TestOutcome

completedDate.description: Completed date time of the run.

controller.description: Name of the test controller used for automated run.

deleteInProgressResults.description: true to delete inProgess Results , false otherwise.

dueDate.description: Due date and time for test run.

errorMessage.description: Error message associated with the run.

iteration.description: The iteration in which to create the run.

logEntries.description: Log entries associated with the run. Use a comma-separated list of multiple log entry objects. { logEntry }, { logEntry }, ...

releaseEnvironmentUri.description: URI of release environment associated with the run.

releaseUri.description: URI of release associated with the run.

runSummary.description: Run summary for run Type = NoConfigRun.

startedDate.description: Start date time of the run.

tags.description: Tags to attach with the test run.

testEnvironmentId.description: ID of the test environment associated with the run.

testSettings.description: An abstracted reference to test setting resource.

ShallowReference.description: An abstracted reference to some other resource. This class is used to provide the build data contracts with a uniform way to reference other resources in a way that provides easy traversal through links.

name.description: Name of the linked resource (definition name, controller name, etc.)

url.description: Full http link to the resource

stageName.description: Name of the stage. Maximum supported length for name is 256 character.

actionPath.description: Path identifier for test step in test case workitem. Note: 1) It is represented in Hexadecimal format with 8 digits for a step. 2) Internally, the step ID value for first step starts with 2 so actionPath = 00000002 step 9, will have an ID = 10 and actionPath = 0000000a step 15, will have an ID =16 and actionPath = 00000010 3) actionPath of shared step is concatenated with the parent step of test case. Example, it would be something of type -  0000000300000001 where 00000003 denotes action path of test step and 00000001 denotes action path for shared step

iterationId.description: Iteration ID of test action result.

stepIdentifier.description: This is step Id of test case. For shared step, it is step Id of shared step in test case workitem; step Id in shared step. Example: TestCase workitem has two steps: 1) Normal step with Id = 1 2) Shared Step with Id = 2. Inside shared step: a) Normal Step with Id = 1 Value for StepIdentifier for First step: "1" Second step: "2;1"

url.description: Url of test action result. Deprecated in hosted environment.

values.description: Attachment type GeneralAttachment , use this as default type unless you have other type.
Attachment type CodeCoverage.
Attachment type ConsoleLog.

attachmentType.description: Attachment type By Default it will be GeneralAttachment. It can be one of the following type. { GeneralAttachment, AfnStrip, BugFilingData, CodeCoverage, IntermediateCollectorData, RunConfig, TestImpactDetails, TmiTestRunDeploymentFiles, TmiTestRunReverseDeploymentFiles, TmiTestResultDetail, TmiTestRunSummary }

afnStripId.description: Test attachment ID of action recording.

area.description: Reference to area path of test.

associatedBugs.description: Reference to bugs linked to test result.

automatedTestId.description: ID representing test method in a dll.

automatedTestName.description: Fully qualified name of test executed.

build.description: Shallow reference to build associated with test result.

buildReference.description: Reference to build associated with test result.

comment.description: Comment in a test result with maxSize= 1000 chars.

completedDate.description: Time when test execution completed(UTC). Completed date should be greater than StartedDate.

configuration.description: Reference to test configuration. Type ShallowReference.

durationInMs.description: Duration of test execution in milliseconds. If not provided value will be set as CompletedDate - StartedDate

failingSince.description: Information when test results started failing.

failureType.description: Failure type of test result. Valid Value= (Known Issue, New Issue, Regression, Unknown, None)

iterationDetails.description: Test result details of test iterations used only for Manual Testing.

lastUpdatedBy.description: Reference to identity last updated test result.

lastUpdatedDate.description: Last updated datetime of test result(UTC).

outcome.description: Test outcome of test result. Valid values = (Unspecified, None, Passed, Failed, Inconclusive, Timeout, Aborted, Blocked, NotExecuted, Warning, Error, NotApplicable, Paused, InProgress, NotImpacted)

release.description: Shallow reference to release associated with test result.

releaseReference.description: Reference to release associated with test result.

resultGroupType.description: Hierarchy type of the result, default value of None means its leaf node.

values.description: Leaf node of test result.
Hierarchy type of test result.
Hierarchy type of test result.
Hierarchy type of test result.
Unknown hierarchy type.

runBy.description: Reference to identity executed the test.

state.description: State of test result. Type TestRunState.

subResults.description: List of sub results inside a test result, if ResultGroupType is not None, it holds corresponding type sub results.

testCaseReferenceId.description: Reference ID of test used by test result. Type TestResultMetaData

testPlan.description: Reference to test plan test case workitem is part of.

testPoint.description: Reference to the test point executed.

testSuite.description: Reference to test suite test case workitem is part of.

TestCaseResultAttachmentModel.description: Test attachment information in a test iteration.

actionPath.description: Path identifier test step in test case workitem.

branchName.description: Branch Name where Flakiness has to be Marked/Unmarked

TestHistoryQuery.description: Filter to get TestCase result history.

automatedTestName.description: Automated test name of the TestCase.

branch.description: Results to be get for a particular branches.

buildDefinitionId.description: Get the results history only for this BuildDefinitionId. This to get used in query GroupBy should be Branch. If this is provided, Branch will have no use.

continuationToken.description: It will be filled by server. If not null means there are some results still to be get, and we need to call this REST API with this ContinuousToken. It is not supposed to be created (or altered, if received from server in last batch) by user.

groupBy.description: Group the result on the basis of TestResultGroupBy. This can be Branch, Environment or null(if results are fetched by BuildDefinitionId)

values.description: Group the results by branches
Group the results by environment

maxCompleteDate.description: History to get between time interval MaxCompleteDate and  (MaxCompleteDate - TrendDays). Default is current date time.

releaseEnvDefinitionId.description: Get the results history only for this ReleaseEnvDefinitionId. This to get used in query GroupBy should be Environment.

resultsForGroup.description: List of TestResultHistoryForGroup which are grouped by GroupBy

testCaseId.description: Get the results history only for this testCaseId. This to get used in query to filter the result along with automatedtestname

trendDays.description: Number of days for which history to collect. Maximum supported value is 7 days. Default is 7 days.

actionResults.description: Test step results in an iteration.

attachments.description: Reference to attachments in test iteration result.

errorMessage.description: Error message in test iteration result execution.

outcome.description: Test outcome if test iteration result.

parameters.description: Test parameters in an iteration.

size.description: Size in Bytes for Log file

buildId.description: BuildId for test log, if context is build

releaseEnvId.description: ReleaseEnvId for test log, if context is Release

releaseId.description: ReleaseId for test log, if context is Release

resultId.description: Resultid for test log, if context is run and log is related to result

runId.description: runid for test log, if context is run

values.description: Log file is associated with Run, result, subresult

subResultId.description: SubResultid for test log, if context is run and log is related to subresult

values.description: Any gereric attachment.

Endpoint type is scoped to file
Operation is successful
Operation failed

flakyIdentifiers.description: List of Flaky Identifier for TestCaseReferenceId

api-Version.name: api-version

accessToken.description: Personal access token. Use any value for the user name and the token as the password.

scopes.vso.test: Grants the ability to read test plans, cases, results and other test management related artifacts.
scopes.vso.test_write: Grants the ability to read, create, and update test plans, cases, results and other test management related artifacts.

parameters.name: instance
parameters.description: TFS server name ({server:port})
